page.title: 16A Mechanical Digger at Work.
page.content: There was a J.C.B. working outside our school. We watched it digging a trench in the road. They are putting new pipes down along{School Street.} The J.C.B.is a{mechanical digger.}It has ascoop on an arm which pivots, and a cab for the driver who works the controls. The digger is scooping out the trench and lifting the earth up and putting it into a{lorry.}When the{ {lorry}is full it drives off. The driver operates a lever to make the shovel work. While he is digging he has like metal legs down. He has a swivel chair, and he operates the digger by moving a lever left, right, to the middle and sideways. Sometimes the driver lifts the legs to move the J.C.B. forwards to dig in another place.
